Predictive Analytics Deployment to Mainframe or Hadoop – Webinar, March 3

Previous post
Next post

 
 
Tags: Deployment, James Taylor, PMML, Standards, Zementis

Join Decision Management guru James Taylor and Michael Zeller, CEO of Zementis, to learn how the Predictive Model Markup Language (PMML) provides a standards-based, repeatable and efficient deployment approach.


 

Webinar: Predictive Analytics Deployment to Mainframe or Hadoop

Thursday, March 3, 2016
2 PM EST / 11 AM PST

The big challenge for analytics-driven organizations today is closing the gap between deriving an analytic result and getting the ROI. Organizations need a consistent and efficient way to deploy analytic results into everything from systems of record like mainframes to modern big data infrastructure.

 
 
Register Now
 
 
Register Now

Join James Taylor and Dr. Michael Zeller

Join James Taylor, CEO of Decision Management Solutions, and Dr. Michael Zeller, CEO of Zementis, in this live webinar to learn how the Predictive Model Markup Language (PMML) provides a standards-based, repeatable and efficient deployment approach from R, open source and commercial analytics products to a wide range of platforms including mainframes like IBM zSystems and new data infrastructure like Hadoop with Spark / Storm / Hive.

  
 

Get Free White Paper

All registrants will receive a copy of the new paper by James Taylor, Standards-based Deployment of Predictive Analytics - Using a standards-based approach to deploy predictive analytics on operational systems from mainframes to Hadoop.
Register Now
 
 
Zementis
3570 Carmel Mountain Road, Ste. 300
San Diego, CA 92130
+1 (619) 330-0780
